scripts.install:api: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (Test-Path backend-api/requirements.txt) { Write-Output 'Skipping Python auto-install to avoid env issues' }"
scripts.dev:api: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Push-Location backend-api; if (Test-Path venv/Scripts/Activate.ps1) { . venv/Scripts/Activate.ps1 }; python -m app.main"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,api,mobile -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.typecheck:mobile: npm run -w mobile-driver typecheck || tsc -p mobile-driver/tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.lint:web: npm run -w web-admin lint || echo "lint web-admin skipped"
scripts.lint:mobile: npm run -w mobile-driver lint || echo "lint mobile-driver skipped"
